reuters.title: ALLIS-CHALMERS <AH> LISTING EXAMINED BY NYSE
reuters.body: The New York Stock Exhcange said it is reviewing the eligiblity for continued listing of the common stock and 5.875 dlrs cumulative convertible preferred stock, series C, of Allis-Chalmers Corp in view of its announcement that it has filed a voluntary petition under Chapter 11 of the Federal bankruptcy code. Reuter 
